proj3
Class DatabaseLoad

java.lang.Object
  proj3.DatabaseLoad

public class DatabaseLoad
extends java.lang.Object

This program populates tables in the database with some default data. Run this program only when the database has been freshly created and the McKoi datbase management system is running as a socket server and after DatabaseCreate.java has been run.

Field Summary
private  boolean successful
          Used to determine if there were any errors in database setup.
 
Constructor Summary
DatabaseLoad()
          Registers the database driver, connects to the database and loads data into the tables, the closes the connection and sets status to true.
 
Method Summary
private  void closeConnection(java.sql.Connection c)
          Closes the connection to the database
private  void executeQueries(java.sql.Connection c)
          Executes a set of queries to load data into the tables in the database.
private  java.sql.Connection getConnection(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String user, java.lang.String pass)
          Attempts to get a connection to the database
 boolean getResult()
          Returns if the creation was successful
static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
          Allows this program to be run standalone.
private  boolean register()
          Register Mckoi JDBC driver
